data: `minecraft:on_use` Allows you to receive an event when the item is used.
`minecraft:on_use` requires the Holiday Creator Features experimental toggle to be set to `true` in order to function properly.

>Holiday Creator Features contains experimental gameplay features. As with all experiments, you may see additions, removals, and changes in functionality in Minecraft versions without significant advanced warning.
>To learn more about Experimental Features, please visit [Experimental Features in Minecraft: Bedrock Edition](../../../../../Documents/ExperimentalFeaturesToggle.md)

data.Description: Event trigger for when the item is used.
